title: what is this font and who created it?
content:
I like this font but don’t know who the creator is. Would like to contact him or her to see if he has made a whole family of fonts for this. Thanks for any help.

Kathy

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 52.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091841/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2052.png) | 24.24 KB |
author: gayatri

comments.content: Thanks. I should have included some part that had all the diacritical marks, but now that I look at it, I see that the creator did basically just take Palatino and modify it. It’s the diacritical marks that I really need.

Gayatri:

Have a look at these diacritical versions

[http://www.sanskritweb.net/fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091841/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/fonts "http://www.sanskritweb.net/fonts")
